vcc.midnightconfig.title: Vesper's Compatibility Compendium
vcc.midnightconfig.EffectiveXWakes.toolt: Toggles all Effective x Wakes compat features
vcc.midnightconfig.oarSplash.tooltip: Toggles Effective particles for oar splash
vcc.midnightconfig.WakeRenderMixin.toolt: Attempts to mimic Effective's plankton glow for some Wakes particles
vcc.midnightconfig.wakesSplashes.tooltip: Use Wakes' splashes instead of Effective's ripples where applicable
vcc.midnightconfig.EffectiveXEffectual.t: Toggles all Effective x Effectual compat features
vcc.midnightconfig.useEffectiveBubbleChe: Use Effective bubbles for Effectual's chest bubble effect
vcc.midnightconfig.useEffectiveBubblePot: Use Effective bubbles for Effectual's pot bubble effect
vcc.midnightconfig.useEffectiveBubbleBre: Use Effective's bubbles for Effectual's breath bubble effect
vcc.midnightconfig.useEffectiveDroplet.t: Use Effective droplet for Effectual's player water drip effect
vcc.midnightconfig.replaceMouthSteam.too: Replace mouth steam with a modified cascade particle from Effective
vcc.midnightconfig.EffectiveXParticleRai: Toggles all Effective X Particle Rain compat features
vcc.midnightconfig..tooltip: Use Particle Rain's ripple in place of Effective's when (normal) droplets hit water
